name: Ask Mr. Foster Travel Service
description: A gateway to the world, where adventure awaits! The 'Ask Mr. Foster Travel Service' office is a bright and modern establishment, filled with the promise of exciting journeys to faraway lands. Gleaming posters of exotic destinations adorn the walls, showcasing a world of possibilities. A friendly, sharply dressed agent sits behind a large metal desk, ready to help you plan the trip of a lifetime. The air is filled with the scent of fresh ink from newly printed tickets and the palpable excitement of a world waiting to be explored.
